explains: n. 埋葬，葬礼；葬地，坟墓
wordGroup: burial depth 埋深，埋藏深度
burial ground 坟地；废物埋藏场

sentences.en: Her body was sent home for burial.
sentences.cn: 她的尸骨已运回家乡安葬。

sentences.en: The priest prepared the body for burial.
sentences.cn: 牧师为尸体做好了下葬的准备。

sentences.en: The bones were disinterred and moved to a burial site.
sentences.cn: 骨头被掘出并移到了一片墓地。
